title.rendered: Major Businesses in Real Estate Taking on Crypto

content.rendered:
Cryptocurrencies are taking over the real estate sector with no means to look back! Many businesses, agencies, and individuals in the real estate industry are taking on crypto, and they are worth looking into! Let’s dive into some of the major companies anchoring in on crypto! 

Republic, New York, NY

Republic allows individuals to invest in private markets free of charge and with flexible minimum investment requirements. Republic provides global real estate options for verified companies making it secure, and a company investors can trust. 

RealBlocks, New York, NY

RealBlocks uses blockchain technology for real estate investing, letting investors buy fractional interest. Through tokenization, RealBlocks reduces fees, provides liquidity options, and fast transactions. 

Owny, Columbus, OH

Owny uses blockchain investing for assets like real estate. Creating an account is free and provides users with a dashboard allowing them to monitor their assets. 

StreetWire, New York, NY

StreetWire has security solutions for real estate transactions thanks to a data provider-controlled encrypted ledger allowing for faster and more transparent property transactions. 

Ubitquity, Wilmington, DE

Ubitquity uses a Non-Fungible Title platform to digitalize titles and Ubitquity Pay for real estate purchases. 

RealT, Aventura, FL

RealT is a fractional real estate investment platform that allows investors to invest in real estate through a token-based network. 

Figure, San Francisco, CA

Figure provides financial services to businesses and individuals letting people use crypto to leverage a home mortgage.

SMARTRealty, Seattle, WA

SMARTRealty uses smart contracts for property purchases and rental agreements. This service can be used for rent, mortgages, and home purchases and establishes protocols that immediately dissolve if not met.

These companies and more are taking on crypto and introducing it to the real estate space with tons of unique solutions. ProperT is an Ethereum-based utility token (ERC20) designed to give homebuyers a 5% token-back reward in tokens when purchasing properties. This discount can be applied to the buyer’s total purchase price or the down payment if a mortgage is provided. Homebuyers that hold ProperTs can purchase their property directly with these tokens and use the rewards at any ForumPay-supported business to get 5% back on any purchase! 

To learn more, visit www.getpropert.com today!
